job.title: Senior Software Engineer | Payments | Banking
job.description: <p><strong><u>Senior Software Engineer - Core Payments – Leading FinTech – Tempe, Arizona</u></strong></p><p><br></p><p>Are you an Experienced Software Engineer that wants to make a meaningful impact in an organization?</p><p><br></p><p>Are you interested in working in a banking organization that works more like a tech innovation org compared to a traditional bank?</p><p><br></p><p>Are you looking to work in an Agile environment with a clear career progression?</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>My Client, a leading Fintech Organization based in the San Francisco Bay Area, are looking to grow their Core Payments tech teams with both Lead and Senior full-stack software engineers with both <strong>Java</strong> and <strong>JavaScript</strong> (<strong>ReactJS</strong>) in <strong>Phoenix, Arizona</strong>.</p><p><br></p><p>The ideal person should have the necessary skills and experience to provide technical guidance, estimation of efforts, understanding; and decide upon the optimal technology solution to achieve the desired business needs.</p><p><br></p><p><strong><u>You will ideally have:</u></strong></p><p><br></p><ul><li>5+ years&nbsp;of development experience as a&nbsp;Software Engineer</li><li>Hands-on development experience in&nbsp;<strong>Java</strong>, J2EE, Spring Boot, etc.</li><li>A deep fascination of building elegant, maintainable, well-documented, secure code – Abstracting and refactoring should be a passion, not a chore</li><li>Experience with&nbsp;TDD&nbsp;and&nbsp;CI/CD</li><li>Experience with <strong>JavaScript</strong>, <strong>React.JS</strong>, HTML, CSS, etc</li><li>Experience with distributed systems and with&nbsp;Micro-services&nbsp;architecture.</li><li>Experience working within a cloud environment, including Amazon Web Services (AWS)</li></ul><p><br></p><p>This is an excellent opportunity to work with a leading and highly respected Financial Organization, which are going through a vast and fascinating digital transformation.</p><p><br></p><p>They have multiple office locations across the USA and can work on a Hybrid Model, although all interviews are currently fully remote.</p><p><br></p><p>Excellent salary, bonus and benefits on offer!</p><p><br></p><p><strong><em>Send in your details ASAP to find out more and receive a full job specification</em></strong></p>
